dcterms:description: A large-scale audio-visual dataset containing 10s videos with synchronized audio and images, used for training and testing in audio-guided image colorization.

dcterms:description: A dataset for environmental sound classification, used in conjunction with other datasets to verify the generalization ability of the proposed method.

dcterms:description: A dataset containing images of various animals, used to construct a test set for verifying the generalization ability of the proposed method.
